sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>When making a combat check with a vehicle weapon, the character may add force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating to the check. The character may spend force points to add successes or advantages (character's choice) to the result.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Intuitive strike</name> <number>TAL0001067</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 23:38:12</sys_created_on> <sys_id>6c066fa8db2e0c542901de90cf961985</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 23:38:12</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
